generated_text:
- road: The image shows a cobblestone surface that serves as a road, with visible tire tracks and a Mercedes-Benz emblem on the hood indicating a vehicle's perspective on the road.
- sidewalk: A paved area adjacent to the road, separated by a curb or barrier, is visible on the left side of the image, suitable for pedestrian use.
- building: The structures on both sides of the street, including the one with the "sky" sign and the ornate building on the right, are clearly buildings.
- wall: The stone wall on the left side of the image, forming part of the building's exterior, is an individual standing wall.
- pole: A vertical pole with a circular traffic sign attached is visible on the left side of the road.
- traffic sign: A circular traffic sign is mounted on the pole, indicating a traffic regulation.
- vegetation: A tree with green leaves is visible on the right side of the image, partially obscuring the building.
- sky: The bright, overcast sky is visible above the buildings and trees.
- truck: A white truck is visible in the background, parked or moving on the road.
- person: A person is visible sitting on a bench in the background, near the center of the image.
